translations: 偶像，受到热爱和崇拜的人（或物）；圣像，神像；<美>幻象；<美>谬论

phrs.translation: 美国偶像（美国真人秀电视节目）

sentences.sentence: Screaming fans vied to get closer to their idol.
sentences.translation: 尖声喊叫的崇拜者争先恐后地涌向他们的偶像。

sentences.sentence: A great cheer went up from the crowd as they caught sight of their idol.
sentences.translation: 一看见他们的偶像，人群爆发出一阵热烈的欢呼声。

sentences.sentence: I have to watch my American Idol.
sentences.translation: 我得回去看我的《美国偶像》。
